g.text: Project Manager
Sales Clerk
Warehouse Employee
Software Product Client
Sales Manager
Customer
G002: Elaborate a Domain Model using DDD.
G003: Configure the project repository.
G004: Configure the project structure to facilitate/accelerate the development of upcoming user stories.
US1001: Specify a new product for sale.
US1002: View/search the products catalog.
US1003: Register a new customer.
US1004: Create a new products order on behalf of a given customer.
US2001: Set up the warehouse plant by uploading a JSON file.
US9001: Prepare a presentation.
US1900: The system has the possibility of being initialized (bootstrap) with some information related to the product catalog and auxiliary information.
US2002: Configure the AGVs available on the warehouse.
US1005: Define a new category of products.
US2003: Access the list of orders that need to be prepared by an AGV and be able to ask/force any of those orders to be immediately prepared by an AGV available.
US3000: Specify a grammar allowing to express several kinds of questionnaires.
US3001: Create a new questionnaire to be further answered by customers meeting the specified criteria.
US4001: The "AGVManager" component supports properly, at request, the needs of the "BackOfficeApp" application as well as the needs the AGV digital twin.
US4002: The "AGVManager" component is enhanced with a basic FIFO algorithm to automatically assign tasks to AGVs.
US5001: Start developing the input communication module of the AGV digital twin to accept requests from the "AGVManager".
US5002: Start developing the output communication module of the AGV digital twin to update its status on the "AGVManager".
US2004: Access the list of orders that have already been prepared by the AGVs and be able to update any of those orders as having been dispatched for customer delivery.
US2005: Open a web dashboard presenting the current status of the AGVs as well as their position in the warehouse layout and keeps updated automatically.
US1501: View/search the product catalog and be able to add a product to the shopping cart.
US1901: The "OrdersServer" component supports properly, at request, the needs of the "CustomerAppMain" application.
US3002: Get a statistical report regarding a previously set up questionnaire.
US3501: List of questionnaires that the system is asking me to answer and be able to answer any of those questionnaires.
US4003: Communications (of the AGVManager) made through the SPOMS2022 protocol to be secured/protected.
US5003: Input communications (of the AGV Digital Twin) made through the SPOMS2022 protocol to be secured/protected.
US5004: Output communications (of the AGV Digital Twin) made through the SPOMS2022 protocol to be secured/protected.
US5100: Develop and integrate the others components/parts of the AGV digital twin (e.g.: movement, obstacle sensors, control unit).
US9002: Prepare a presentation
US1006: Access a list of orders that had been dispatched for customer delivery and be able to update some of those orders to as being delivered.
US2006: Communications made through the SPOMS2022 protocol to be secured/protected.
US1502: View/check the status of my open orders.
US1902: I want the communications made through the SPOMS2022 protocol to be secured/protected.
